DOC.brief_summary: The goal study evaluate safety & efficacy cryoablation use IceCure medical 's IceSense3™ device treatment symptomatic uterine fibroid percutaneous lap-assisted approach .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Premenopausal woman age 30 50 ( inclusive ) 2 . Patient complete family planning desire future childbearing . 3 . Patient suffer menorrhagia result symptomatic uterine fibroid . 4 . Patient 's uterus size small 18 gestational week . 5 . Patient wish preserve uterus avoid hysterectomy . 6 . Patient 13 treatable uterine fibroid size 10cm measure US/MRI . 7 . Overall treated fibroid volume ≤ 3,138cm3 ( width x length x height x 0.523 ) 8 . Patient clinical menorrhagia indicate menstrual blood loss ≥160 ml one baseline cycle prior treatment . 9 . Patient able visit clinic need 1 year followup period follow treatment . 10 . The patient inform study agree provision , sign IRB approve write informed consent , include data privacy authorization . 1 . Patient finish family planning 2 . Patient already treat uterine fibroid past ( UAE , myomectomy , HIFU , … ) undergo endometrial ablation . 3 . Patient treat GnRH last 3 month . 4 . Patient know symptomatic endometriosis completely remove laparoscopic procedure . 5 . Patient know suspect adenomyosis 6 . Patient active abdominal/pelvic inflammatory disease . 7 . Patient know suspect gynecologic malignancy . 8 . Patient submucosal fibroid type `` zero '' 9 . Patient undiagnosed vaginal bleeding 10 . Patient blood clot disorder 11 . Patients carry contagious disease Tuberculosis Hepatitis AIDS . 12 . Patient participate trial use drug device . 13 . Patient unable commit study requirement include followup visit questionnaire . 14 . Patient contraindication laparoscopic surgery
